articles.title: Jurgen Klopp hands €250 million transfer boost to Real Madrid - The Real Champs
articles.description: Real Madrid have added four fresh faces to their squad this summer. Jude Bellingham, Fran Garcia and Arda Guler have been signed on a permanent basis while...
articles.content: Real Madrid have added four fresh faces to their squad this summer. Jude Bellingham, Fran Garcia and Arda Guler have been signed on a permanent basis while Joselu has been brought in on a season-long… [+1969 chars]
